attributes.action: Stop before it starts phoneline tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the possible tax on phone lines to pay for broadband across the country. It is unfair to expect people to pay for something they may or may not have. People pay enough for they're internet access. A tax will force people to give up internet access, as they will no longer be able to afford to use it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
